properties.areaDesc: Newton, MS; Clarke, MS; Lauderdale, MS; Jasper, MS
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 11 at 10:06AM CST until January 11 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Eastern Jasper County in east central Mississippi...
Southeastern Newton County in east central Mississippi...
Clarke County in east central Mississippi...
Lauderdale County in east central Mississippi...

* Until 1100 AM CST.

* At 1006 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from near Garlandville to near Moss, moving northeast at
60 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees.

* Severe thunderstorms will be near...
Vernon around 1010 AM CST.
Barnett, Meehan, Stafford Springs and Goodwater around 1020 AM
CST.
Meridian, Nellieburg, Suqualena and Orange around 1025 AM CST.
Quitman, Marion and Stonewall around 1035 AM CST.
Meridian Station, Sable, Daleville and Sykes around 1040 AM CST.
Lauderdale and Middleton around 1045 AM CST.
Snell and Increase around 1050 AM CST.
Alamucha around 1100 AM CST.

Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include
Pachuta, Shubuta and Chunky.
properties.instruction:
For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.
